author: IGN Staff
title: The Good and Bad of Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: There’s a lot that’s great about Nintendo’s newest town builder – though there are some things that, much like our initial tent setups, could use some improvement.
content: Animal Crossing: New Horizons has been out for a few weeks, now, and plenty of us in the IGN offices have been capturing bugs and selling weeds to make our perfect island getaways. Theres a lot thats great about Nintendos newest town builder though there are … [+14412 chars]
